mapper.select: SELECT l.id, r.content,t.type, l.user_id, l.content_id, re.comment, l.created_at, l.updated_at FROM hangang.report_log AS l JOIN hangang.report AS r ON l.report_id = r.id JOIN hangang.report_type AS t ON l.type_id = t.id JOIN hangang.review AS re ON l.content_id = re.id WHERE l.type_id = 1 AND l.is_deleted = 0 AND re.is_deleted = 0;

SELECT l.id, r.content,t.type, l.user_id,l.content_id, cm.comments,l.created_at, l.updated_at FROM hangang.report_log AS l JOIN hangang.report AS r ON l.report_id = r.id JOIN hangang.report_type AS t ON l.type_id = t.id JOIN hangang.lecture_bank_comment AS cm ON l.content_id = cm.id WHERE l.type_id = 3 AND l.is_deleted = 0 AND cm.is_deleted= 0;

SELECT l.id, r.content AS content_name ,t.type, l.user_id, l.content_id, lb.title, lb.content,lb.point_price, l.created_at, l.updated_at FROM hangang.report_log AS l JOIN hangang.report AS r ON l.report_id = r.id JOIN hangang.report_type AS t ON l.type_id = t.id JOIN hangang.lecture_bank AS lb ON l.content_id = lb.id WHERE l.type_id = 2 AND l.is_deleted = 0 AND lb.is_deleted = 0;
SELECT id, filename, url, ext FROM hangang.upload_file WHERE lecture_bank_id = #{id} AND available = 1;
